directions: Combine tomatoes, onion, water, mustard seed, mustard powder, garlic, bay leaf, and black pepper in a large, heavy pot over medium heat; bring to a simmer and cook for 10 minutes. Stir soy sauce through the tomato mixture; continue cooking another 5 minutes. Season with salt. Remove bay leaf to serve.
ingredients: 12 roma (plum) tomatoes - peeled, quartered, and seeded
title: Stewed Tomatoes Spiced with Mustard
